Package jrtr.swrenderer

Class SWRenderContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.swrenderer.SWRenderContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RenderContext
    public class SWRenderContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements RenderContext
    A skeleton for a software renderer. It works in combination with SWRenderPanel, which displays the output image. In project 2 you will implement your own rasterizer in this class.

    To use the software renderer, you will simply use a RenderPanel derived from SWRenderPanel in the user application.

        public void setViewportSize​(int width,
                            int height)
        Set a new viewport size. The render context will also need to store a viewport matrix, which you need to reset here.

      • endFrame

        private void endFrame()

      • draw

        private void draw​(RenderItem renderItem)
        The main rendering method. This collects all information necessary to render each triangle and calls @drawTriangle to perform the rasterization.

      • drawTriangle

        void drawTriangle​(float[][] positions,
                  float[][] colors,
                  float[][] normals,
                  float[][] texCoords,
                  Material mat)
        Draw a triangle. Implement triangle rasterization here. You will need to include a z-buffer to resolve visibility.

      • makeShader
